events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position and our team will review your qualifications shortly.
Your application for the software engineering role has been categorized under Technical Development, enabling us to route it to the appropriate team.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application to help guide you through the next steps of our hiring process for the engineering department.
We completed your initial screening interview and were impressed by your background in software development and relevant project experience.
Thank you for your prompt response and confirmation for the upcoming technical interview; we appreciate your enthusiasm.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th at 3 PM UTC with our senior engineering team members.
You successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong coding skills and problem-solving ability aligned with our engineering standards.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 11 AM UTC to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career aspirations.
We completed your HR interview successfully, and your alignment with our team's values and vision was very encouraging.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the software engineer role, reflecting your skills and experience, with an attractive compensation package.
Thank you for providing your feedback on the offer; we appreciate your thoughtful considerations and openness to discuss terms.
We are excited to confirm that you accepted our offer and look forward to welcoming you onboard as a valued software engineer.
Your onboarding process has officially started, including access to company resources and scheduling orientation sessions.
The hiring process for the software engineer role is now closed, and we are thrilled to have you as part of our engineering team.
